name: openCanvas 6 Event File
summary: An OE6 file contains drawing strokes, or "events," recorded by Portalgraphics openCanvas 6, a digital drawing application. It saves a drawing that consists of individual stroke events that are automatically redrawn when opened in the software. Recorded events are not limited to brush strokes, they may also be shapes, text, color fills, gradients, and eraser actions.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: OE6 file open in Portalgraphics openCanvas 7
